name: Pengy's Rage Game
description:
Once you download the game unzip it and you can play the executable in the folder.

This game is my first EVER indie game, so its not going to be the best, but it's a funny game, a platformer and 2D, so its bound to have some good moments!

This game has odd humor, and a wacky villain, also having interactive game play, can you beat it?

Controls:

Walk - A and D

Run: Hold Shift

Crouch: Hold S

Jump: Space
